Intro_1.5-Bloch: Oh, right. You're an AI, telepathy won't work. I'm your mentalist.
Intro_1.6-CAT: Oh, so you do magic tricks?
Intro_1.7-CAT: How is that even remotely useful...
Intro_1.8-Bloch: I guess being able to make jokes about you with the rest of the crew, and you not being able to hear them IS a kind of a trick...
